:

Validate dependancies from expath-pkg file

: : @author Andy Bunce : @version 0.2 :) declare namespace pkg="http://expath.org/ns/pkg"; declare variable $pkg:=doc("expath-pkg.xml")=>trace("DOC"); (:~ : raise error if environment incorrect :) let $basex:=$pkg/pkg:package/pkg:dependency[@processor="http://basex.org/"]/@version/string() let $pkgs:=$pkg/pkg:package/pkg:dependency[@name] return if( db:system()/generalinformation/version/tokenize(.," ")[1] ne $basex)then error(xs:QName("xpg:version"),"BaseX version not supported") else ( for $p in $pkgs return if(repo:list()[@name=$p/@name]/@version ne $p/@version) then error(xs:QName("pkg:version"),$p/@name) else () ,"xqDocA dependancies are all installed." )
